main event: A bright silvery object, round or disk-shaped, was sighted over Blanca, Colorado on 12 September 1948.
interesting points: The object had an estimated diameter of 30-40 feet., The object moved very rapidly at an estimated speed in excess of 500 mph., The sighting lasted approximately 25 seconds., Mr. and Mrs. Cyril F. Williams were the witnesses of the sighting., No aircraft was reported in the area at the time.
sighted object: bright silvery round or disk-shaped object
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. Cyril F. Williams
